data.eml:eml: Catalog of Nabidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera) for the Neotropical Region

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Volpi, Lorena N., Coscarón, Maria Del Carmen (2010): Catalog of Nabidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera) for the Neotropical Region. Zootaxa 2513: 50-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.196077
